Menu Translate

Snap a menu photo for instant AI translation in 9 languages. Get cultural context, pronunciation help, and visual order sheets. Never guess what you’re ordering again!

Nothing humbles a traveler faster than a local-language menu with zero translations. You sit down hungry and confident, ready for a feast, and five minutes later you’re sweating over what might be chicken or absolutely not chicken. Meanwhile, the locals next to you order and their table overflows with dishes you didn’t even know existed—the kind you meant to try but never had the words for.

Menu Translate breaks down language barriers so you can enjoy authentic dining experiences anywhere in the world.

KEY FEATURES

• AI-Powered Translation Snap a photo of any menu and watch it transform into your language in seconds. Our advanced AI technology works with any menu layout—vertical or horizontal text, multiple columns, or complex designs. Just point and shoot.

• 9 Languages Supported Translate menus to English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), French, Spanish, German, Italian, and more. Your language, your way.

• Rich Information Get cultural context, detailed explanations, and insights about each dish to make informed choices. Understand ingredients, cooking methods, and regional specialties before you order.

• Easy Ordering Order confidently with visual order sheets. Build your perfect meal and show it to your server. No more pointing at random items or hoping for the best.

• Pronunciation Help Learn how to pronounce dish names correctly. Speak confidently when ordering and connect with local culture.

• Smart Photo Processing Works seamlessly with any menu format. Our intelligent system recognizes text in various layouts and orientations, ensuring accurate translations every time.

PERFECT FOR • Travelers exploring new cuisines • Food enthusiasts discovering authentic dishes • Anyone dining at restaurants with foreign-language menus • People who want to make informed food choices

HOW IT WORKS

  1. Open Menu Translate
  2. Take a photo of the menu (or select from your gallery)
  3. Get instant translation in your preferred language
  4. Explore dish details, cultural context, and pronunciation
  5. Build your order with visual order sheets
  6. Show your order to the server and enjoy!

Menu Translate transforms every dining experience from a guessing game into an adventure. Great trips deserve great food, not random plates that leave you feeling like you watched everyone else enjoy the real show while you missed the main act.

Download Menu Translate today and never miss out on the perfect dish again.
